context: Together Lily, David, and Bodhi collected 43 insects. Lily found 7 more than David. David found half of what Bodhi found.
main-q: How many insects did Lily find?
qa-pairs: Let B = the number of insects Bodhi collected.
How many insects did David collect?
How many insects did Lily collect?

How many insects did Lily collect?

context: Bahati, Azibo, and Dinar each contributed to their team's 45 points. Bahati scored the most points and it was 20 more than Azibo scored and 10 more points than Dinar scored.
main-q: How many points did Azibo score?
qa-pairs: Let B = the number of points Bahati scored.
How many points did Azibo score?
How many points did Dinar score?
How many points did Azibo score?
